user_query: Fetch the full listing of data from the user profile of 'sindex' and also provide me with a comprehensive list of their friends and groups. I'm interested in getting a complete picture of their Steam Community presence.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the user profile data for 'sindex' from the Steam Community.
Fetch the list of friends associated with the user 'sindex'.
Gather the list of groups that the user 'sindex' is part of.
Compile and present the complete user profile, friends list, and groups together.
